mapper.select:
SELECT ERP_SERVER_ID AS erpServerId ,ERP_MAIN_ID AS erpMainId ,MAIN1_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS main1CpuUsageChk ,MAIN1_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS main1CpuUsageBigo ,MAIN1_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS main1MemUsageChk ,MAIN1_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS main1MemUsageBigo ,MAIN1_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS main1DiskUsageChk ,MAIN1_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS main1DiskUsageBigo ,MAIN1_CLUST_CHK AS main1ClustChk ,MAIN1_CSLUT_BIGO AS main1ClustBigo ,MAIN1_EVENT_CHK AS main1EventChk ,MAIN1_EVENT_BIGO AS main1EventBigo ,MAIN2_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS main2CpuUsageChk ,MAIN2_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS main2CpuUsageBigo ,MAIN2_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS main2MemUsageChk ,MAIN2_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS main2MemUsageBigo ,MAIN2_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS main2DiskUsageChk ,MAIN2_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS main2DiskUsageBigo ,MAIN2_CLUST_CHK AS main2ClustChk ,MAIN2_CLUST_BIGO AS main2ClustBigo ,MAIN2_EVENT_CHK AS main2EventChk ,MAIN2_EVENT_BIGO AS main2EventBigo ,MAIN3_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS main3CpuUsageChk ,MAIN3_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS main3CpuUSageBigo ,MAIN3_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS main3MemUsageChk ,MAIN3_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS main3MemUsageBigo ,MAIN3_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS main3DiskUsageChk ,MAIN3_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS main3DiskUsageBigo ,MAIN3_CLUST_CHK AS main3ClustChk ,MAIN3_CSLUT_BIGO AS main3ClustBigo ,MAIN3_EVENT_CHK AS main3EventChk ,MAIN3_EVENT_BIGO AS main3EventBigo ,DB1_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS db1CpuUsageCHk ,DB1_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS db1CpuUsageBigo ,DB1_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS db1MemUsageChk ,DB1_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS db1MemUsageBigo ,DB1_SWAPUSAGE_CHK AS db1SwapUsageChk ,DB1_SWAPUSAGE_BIGO AS db1SwapUsageBigo ,DB1_OVERLOAD_CHK AS db1OverLoadChk ,DB1_OVERLOAD_BIGO AS db1OverLoadBigo ,DB1_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS db1DiskUsageChk ,DB1_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS db1DiskUsageBigo ,DB1_PROCESS_CHK AS db1ProcessChk ,DB1_PROCESS_BIGO AS db1ProcessBigo ,DB2_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS db2CpuUsageChk ,DB2_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS db2CpuUsageBigo ,DB2_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS db2MemUsageChk ,DB2_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS db2MemUsageBigo ,DB2_SWAPUSAGE_CHK AS db2SwapUsageChk ,DB2_SWAPUSAGE_BIGO AS db2SwapUsageBigo ,DB2_OVERLOAD_CHK AS db2OverLoadChk ,DB2_OVERLOAD_BIGO AS db2OverLoadBigo ,DB2_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS db2DiskUsageChk ,DB2_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS db2DiskUsageBigo ,DB2_PROCESS_CHK AS db2ProcessChk ,DB2_PROCESS_BIGO AS db2ProcessBigo ,DB2_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS db2CpuUsageChk ,DB2_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS db2CpuUsageBigo ,DEVDB_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS devDbCpuUsageChk ,DEVDB_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS devDbCpuUsageBigo ,DEVDB_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS devDbMemUsageChk ,DEVDB_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS devDbMemUsageBigo ,DEVDB_SWAPUSAGE_CHK AS devDbSwapUsageChk ,DEVDB_SWAPUSAGE_BIGO AS devDbSwapUsageBigo ,DEVDB_OVERLOAD_CHK AS devDbOverLoadChk ,DEVDB_OVERLOAD_BIGO AS devDbOverLoadBigo ,DEVDB_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS devDbDiskUsageChk ,DEVDB_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS devDbDiskUsageBigo ,DEVDB_PROCESS_CHK AS devDbProcessChk ,DEVDB_PROCESS_BIGO AS devDbProcessBigo ,BACK_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS backUpCpuUsageChk ,BACK_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS backUpCpuUsageBigo ,BACK_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS backUpMemUsageChk ,BACK_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS backUpMemUsageBigo ,BACK_SWAPUSAGE_CHK AS backUpSwapUsageChk ,BACK_SWAPUSAGE_BIGO AS backUpSwapUsageBigo ,BACK_OVERLOAD_CHK AS backUpOverLoadChk ,BACK_OVERLOAD_BIGO AS backUpOverLoadBigo ,BACK_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS backUpDiskUsageChk ,BACK_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS backUpDiskUsageBigo ,BACK_PROCESS_CHK AS backUpProcessChk ,BACK_PROCESS_BIGO AS backUpProcessBigo
FROM
ERP_DAILY_SERVER
WHERE
ERP_MAIN_ID = #{erpMainId}

SELECT ERP_VM_ID AS erpVmId ,ERP_MAIN_ID AS erpMainId ,BNK1_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS bnk1CpuUsageChk ,BNK1_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS bnk1CpuUsageBigo ,BNK1_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS bnk1MemUsageChk ,BNK1_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS bnk1MemUsageBigo ,BNK1_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS bnk1DiskUsageChk ,BNK1_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS bnk1DiskUsageBigo ,BNK1_EVENT_CHK AS bnk1EventChk ,BNK1_EVENT_BIGO AS bnk1EventBigo ,BNK2_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS bnk2CpuUsageChk ,BNK2_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS bnk2CpuUsageBigo ,BNK2_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS bnk2MemUsageChk ,BNK2_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS bnk2MemUsageBigo ,BNK2_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS bnk2DiskUsageChk ,BNK2_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS bnk2DiskUsageBigo ,BNK2_EVENT_CHK AS bnk2EventChk ,BNK2_EVENT_BIGO AS bnk2EventBigo ,TAX1_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS tax1CpuUsageChk ,TAX1_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS tax1CpuUsageBigo ,TAX1_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS tax1MemUsageChk exWeb2MemUsageBigo ,EXWEB2_SWAPUSAGE_CHK AS exWeb2SwapUsageChk ,EXWEB2_SWAPUSAGE_BIGO AS exWeb2SwapUsageBigo ,EXWEB2_OVERLOAD_CHK AS exWeb2OverLoadChk ,EXWEB2_OVERLOAD_BIGO AS exWeb2OverLoadBigo ,EXWEB2_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS exWeb2DiskUsageChk ,EXWEB2_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS exWeb2DiskUsageBigo ,EXWEB2_PROCESS_CHK AS exWeb2ProcessChk ,EXWEB2_PROCESS_BIGO AS exWeb2ProcessBigo ,INWEB1_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS inWeb1CpuUsageChk ,INWEB1_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS inWeb1CpuUsageBigo ,INWEB1_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS inWeb1MemUsageChk ,INWEB1_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS inWeb1MemUsageBigo ,INWEB1_SWAPUSAGE_CHK AS inWeb1SwapUsageChk ,INWEB1_SWAPUSAGE_BIGO AS inWeb1SwapUsageBigo ,INWEB1_OVERLOAD_CHK AS inWeb1OverLoadChk ,INWEB1_OVERLOAD_BIGO AS inWeb1OverLoadBigo ,INWEB1_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS inWeb1DiskUsageChk ,INWEB1_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS inWeb1DiskUsageBigo ,INWEB1_PROCESS_CHK AS inWeb1ProcessChk ,INWEB1_PROCESS_BIGO AS inWeb1ProcessBigo ,INWEB2_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS inWeb2CpuUsageChk ,INWEB2_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS inWeb2CpuUsageBigo ,INWEB2_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS inWeb2MemUsageChk ,INWEB2_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS inWeb2MemUsageBigo ,INWEB2_SWAPUSAGE_CHK AS inWeb2SwapUsageChk ,INWEB2_SWAPUSAGE_BIGO AS inWeb2SwapUsageBigo ,INWEB2_OVERLOAD_CHK AS ,INWEB2_PROCESS_BIGO AS inWeb2ProcessBigo ,WAS1_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS was1CpuUsageChk ,WAS1_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS was1CpuUsageBigo ,WAS1_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS was1MemUsageChk ,WAS1_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS was1MemUsageBigo ,WAS1_SWAPUSAGE_CHK AS was1SwapUsageChk ,WAS1_SWAPUSAGE_BIGO AS was1SwapUsageBigo ,WAS1_OVERLOAD_CHK AS was1OverLoadChk ,WAS1_OVERLOAD_BIGO AS was1OverLoadBigo ,WAS1_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS was1DiskUsageChk ,WAS1_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS was1DiskUsageBigo ,WAS1_PROCESS_CHK AS was1ProcessChk ,WAS1_PROCESS_BIGO AS was1ProcessBigo ,WAS2_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS was2CpuUsageChk ,WAS2_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS was2CpuUsageBigo ,WAS2_OVERLOAD_BIGO AS was2OverLoadBigo ,WAS2_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS was2DiskUsageChk ,WAS2_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS was2DiskUsageBigo ,WAS2_PROCESS_CHK AS was2ProcessChk ,WAS2_PROCESS_BIGO AS was2ProcessBigo ,ERPMGNT_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS erpMgntCpuUsageChk ,ERPMGNT_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS erpMgntCpuUsageBigo ,ERPMGNT_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS erpMgntMemUsageChk ,ERPMGNT_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS erpMgntMemUsageBigo ,DEVWEB_SWAPUSAGE_BIGO AS devWebSwapUsageBigo ,DEVWEB_OVERLOAD_CHK AS devWebOverLoadChk ,DEVWEB_OVERLOAD_BIGO AS devWebOverLoadBigo ,DEVWEB_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS devWebDiskUsageChk ,DEVWEB_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS devWebDiskUsageBigo ,DEVWEB_PROCESS_CHK AS devWebProcessChk ,DEVWEB_PROCESS_BIGO AS devWebProcessBigo ,DEVWAS_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS devWasCpuUsageChk ,DEVWAS_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS devWasCpuUsageBigo ,DEVWAS_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS devWasMemUsageChk ,DEVWAS_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS devWasMemUsageBigo ,DEVWAS_SWAPUSAGE_CHK AS devWasSwapUsageChk ,DEVWAS_SWAPUSAGE_BIGO AS devWasSwapUsageBigo ,DEVWAS_OVERLOAD_CHK AS devWasOverLoadChk ,DEVWAS_OVERLOAD_BIGO AS devWasOverLoadBigo ,DEVWAS_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS devWasDiskUsageChk ,DEVWAS_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS devWasDiskUsageBigo ,DEVWAS_PROCESS_CHK AS devWasProcessChk ,DEVWAS_PROCESS_BIGO AS devWasProcessBigo ,JENIUS_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS jeniusCpuUsageChk ,JENIUS_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS jeniusCpuUsageBigo ,JENIUS_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS jeniusMemUsageChk ,JENIUS_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS jeniusMemUsageBigo ,JENIUS_SWAPUSAGE_CHK AS jeniusSwapUsageChk ,JENIUS_SWAPUSAGE_BIGO AS jeniusSwapUsageBigo ,JENIUS_OVERLOAD_CHK AS jeniusOverLoadChk ,JENIUS_OVERLOAD_BIGO AS jeniusOverLoadBigo ,JENIUS_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS jeniusDiskUsageChk ,JENIUS_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS jeniusDiskUsageBigo ,JENIUS_PROCESS_CHK AS jeniusProcessChk ,JENIUS_PROCESS_BIGO AS jeniusProcessBigo FROM ERP_DAILY_VM WHERE ERP_MAIN_ID = #{erpMainId}
SELECT ERP_STORAGE_ID AS erpStorageId ,ERP_MAIN_ID AS erpMainId ,ERP_NASCLUST_CHK AS erpNasSanClustChk ,ERP_NASCLUST_BIGO AS erpNasSanClustBigo FROM ERP_DAILY_STORAGE WHERE ERP_MAIN_ID = #{erpMainId}
